meaningMnemonic: The kanji is <kanji>distinction</kanji>. To distinct something would be nice, but this is used more like <vocabulary>to shine at</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to shine on</vocabulary>, like when a light shines on someone on a stage, distinguishing them from everyone else.
readingMnemonic: The reading of the kanji is actually the same as the reading for this word, making things easy (both on'yomi and kun'yomi are さ).
